mapper.update: update b_sample set sampid=sampid ,sampcode=#{sampcode} ,storageid=#{storageid} ,grainid=#{grainid} ,grainattrid=#{grainattrid} ,producingyear=#{producingyear} ,sampdate=#{sampdate} ,sampname=#{sampname} ,sampqty=#{sampqty} ,standardqty=#{standardqty} ,sampfrom=#{sampfrom} ,iccardnum=#{iccardnum} ,validdate=#{validdate} ,baoguanuse=#{baoguanuse} ,baoguanpos=#{baoguanpos} ,clearflag=#{clearflag} ,cleardate=#{cleardate} ,clearuser=#{clearuser} where sampid=#{sampid}

update b_sample set sampid=sampid ,sampcode=#{sampcode} ,groupid=#{groupid} ,companyid=#{companyid} ,graindepotid=#{graindepotid} ,storageid=#{storageid} ,grainid=#{grainid} ,grainattrid=#{grainattrid} ,producingyear=#{producingyear} ,sampdate=#{sampdate} ,sampname=#{sampname} ,sampqty=#{sampqty} ,standardqty=#{standardqty} ,sampfrom=#{sampfrom} ,iccardnum=#{iccardnum} ,validdate=#{validdate} ,baoguanuse=#{baoguanuse} ,baoguanpos=#{baoguanpos} ,clearflag=#{clearflag} ,cleardate=#{cleardate} ,clearuser=#{clearuser} ,createuserid=#{createuserid} ,createtime=#{createtime} ,delflag=#{delflag} where 1=1 and sampid in (${Where_IdsStr}) and sampid =#{Where_Id} and sampid=#{Where_sampid} and sampcode=#{Where_sampcode} and groupid=#{Where_groupid} and companyid=#{Where_companyid} and graindepotid=#{Where_graindepotid} and storageid=#{Where_storageid} and grainid=#{Where_grainid} and grainattrid=#{Where_grainattrid} and producingyear=#{Where_producingyear} and sampdate=#{Where_sampdate} and sampname=#{Where_sampname} and sampqty=#{Where_sampqty} and standardqty=#{Where_standardqty} and sampfrom=#{Where_sampfrom} and iccardnum=#{Where_iccardnum} and validdate=#{Where_validdate} and baoguanuse=#{Where_baoguanuse} and baoguanpos=#{Where_baoguanpos} and clearflag=#{Where_clearflag} and cleardate=#{Where_cleardate} and clearuser=#{Where_clearuser} and createuserid=#{Where_createuserid} and createtime=#{Where_createtime} and delflag=#{Where_delflag}
mapper.select: select t.sampid "sampid", t.sampcode "sampcode", t.groupid "groupid", t.companyid "companyid", t.graindepotid "graindepotid", t.storageid "storageid", t.grainid "grainid", t.grainattrid "grainattrid", t.producingyear "producingyear", t.sampdate "sampdate", t.sampname "sampname", t.sampqty "sampqty", t.standardqty "standardqty", t.sampfrom "sampfrom", t.iccardnum "iccardnum", t.validdate "validdate", t.baoguanuse "baoguanuse", t.baoguanpos "baoguanpos", t.clearflag "clearflag", t.cleardate "cleardate", t.clearuser "clearuser", t.createuserid "createuserid", t.createtime "createtime", t.delflag "delflag", lc.companyname "companyname", lgp.groupname "groupname", lgd.graindepotname "graindepotname", ls.storagename "storagename", lgr.grainattrname "grainattrname" from b_sample t left join l_company lc on lc.companyid=t.companyid left join l_group lgp on lgp.groupid=t.groupid left join l_graindepot lgd on lgd.graindepotid=t.graindepotid left join l_storage ls on ls.storageid=t.storageid left join l_grain lg on lg.grainid=t.grainid left join l_grainattr lgr on lgr.grainattrid=t.grainattrid where sampid=#{sampid}

select t.sampid "sampid", t.sampcode "sampcode", t.groupid "groupid", t.companyid "companyid", t.graindepotid "graindepotid", t.storageid "storageid", t.grainid "grainid", t.grainattrid "grainattrid", t.producingyear "producingyear", t.sampdate "sampdate", t.sampname "sampname", t.sampqty "sampqty", t.standardqty "standardqty", t.sampfrom "sampfrom", t.iccardnum "iccardnum", t.validdate "validdate", t.baoguanuse "baoguanuse", t.baoguanpos "baoguanpos", t.clearflag "clearflag", t.cleardate "cleardate", t.clearuser "clearuser", t.createuserid "createuserid", t.createtime "createtime", t.delflag "delflag" from b_sample t where 1=1 and t.sampid=#{sampid} and t.sampcode=#{sampcode} and t.groupid=#{groupid} and t.companyid=#{companyid} and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid} and t.storageid=#{storageid} and t.grainid=#{grainid} and t.grainattrid=#{grainattrid} and t.producingyear=#{producingyear} and t.sampdate=#{sampdate} and t.sampname=#{sampname} and t.sampqty=#{sampqty} and t.standardqty=#{standardqty} and t.sampfrom=#{sampfrom} and t.iccardnum=#{iccardnum} and t.validdate=#{validdate} and t.baoguanuse=#{baoguanuse} and t.baoguanpos=#{baoguanpos} and t.clearflag=#{clearflag} and t.cleardate=#{cleardate} and t.clearuser=#{clearuser} and t.createuserid=#{createuserid} and t.createtime=#{createtime} and t.delflag=#{delflag}

select t.sampid "sampid", t.sampcode "sampcode", t.groupid "groupid", t.companyid "companyid", t.graindepotid "graindepotid", t.storageid "storageid", t.grainid "grainid", t.grainattrid "grainattrid", t.producingyear "producingyear", t.sampdate "sampdate", t.sampname "sampname", t.sampqty "sampqty", t.standardqty "standardqty", t.sampfrom "sampfrom", t.iccardnum "iccardnum", t.validdate "validdate", t.baoguanuse "baoguanuse", t.baoguanpos "baoguanpos", t.clearflag "clearflag", t.cleardate "cleardate", t.clearuser "clearuser", t.createuserid "createuserid", t.createtime "createtime", t.delflag "delflag" from b_sample t where 1=1 and t.sampid=#{sampid} and t.sampcode=#{sampcode} and t.groupid=#{groupid} and t.companyid=#{companyid} and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid} and t.storageid=#{storageid} and t.grainid=#{grainid} and t.grainattrid=#{grainattrid} and t.producingyear=#{producingyear} and t.sampdate=#{sampdate} and t.sampname=#{sampname} and t.sampqty=#{sampqty} and t.standardqty=#{standardqty} and t.sampfrom=#{sampfrom} and t.iccardnum=#{iccardnum} and t.validdate=#{validdate} and t.baoguanuse=#{baoguanuse} and t.baoguanpos=#{baoguanpos} and t.clearflag=#{clearflag} and t.cleardate=#{cleardate} and t.clearuser=#{clearuser} and t.createuserid=#{createuserid} and t.createtime=#{createtime} and t.delflag=#{delflag}
mapper.delete: delete from b_sample where 1=1 and sampid in (${Where_IdsStr}) and sampid =#{Where_Id} and sampid=#{Where_sampid} and sampcode=#{Where_sampcode} and groupid=#{Where_groupid} and companyid=#{Where_companyid} and graindepotid=#{Where_graindepotid} and storageid=#{Where_storageid} and grainid=#{Where_grainid} and grainattrid=#{Where_grainattrid} and producingyear=#{Where_producingyear} and sampdate=#{Where_sampdate} and sampname=#{Where_sampname} and sampqty=#{Where_sampqty} and standardqty=#{Where_standardqty} and sampfrom=#{Where_sampfrom} and iccardnum=#{Where_iccardnum} and validdate=#{Where_validdate} and baoguanuse=#{Where_baoguanuse} and baoguanpos=#{Where_baoguanpos} and clearflag=#{Where_clearflag} and cleardate=#{Where_cleardate} and clearuser=#{Where_clearuser} and createuserid=#{Where_createuserid} and createtime=#{Where_createtime} and delflag=#{Where_delflag}
mapper.select: select t.sampid "sampid", t.sampcode "sampcode", t.groupid "groupid", t.companyid "companyid", t.graindepotid "graindepotid", t.storageid "storageid", t.grainid "grainid", t.grainattrid "grainattrid", t.producingyear "producingyear", t.sampdate "sampdate", t.sampname "sampname", t.sampqty "sampqty", t.standardqty "standardqty", t.sampfrom "sampfrom", t.iccardnum "iccardnum", t.validdate "validdate", t.baoguanuse "baoguanuse", t.baoguanpos "baoguanpos", t.clearflag "clearflag", t.cleardate "cleardate", t.clearuser "clearuser", t.createuserid "createuserid", t.createtime "createtime", t.delflag "delflag", ls.storagename "storagename", lg.grainname "grainname", lgr.grainattrname "grainattrname" from b_sample t left join l_storage ls on ls.storageid=t.storageid left join l_grain lg on lg.grainid=t.grainid left join l_grainattr lgr on lgr.grainattrid=t.grainattrid where 1=1 and t.sampid=#{sampid} and t.sampcode=#{sampcode} and t.groupid=#{groupid} and t.companyid=#{companyid} and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid} and t.storageid=#{storageid} and t.grainid=#{grainid} and t.grainattrid=#{grainattrid} and t.producingyear=#{producingyear} and t.sampdate=#{sampdate} and t.sampname=#{sampname} and t.sampqty=#{sampqty} and t.standardqty=#{standardqty} and t.sampfrom=#{sampfrom} and t.iccardnum=#{iccardnum} and t.validdate=#{validdate} and t.baoguanuse=#{baoguanuse} and t.baoguanpos=#{baoguanpos} and t.clearflag=#{clearflag} and t.cleardate=#{cleardate} and t.clearuser=#{clearuser} and t.createuserid=#{createuserid} and t.createtime=#{createtime} and t.delflag=#{delflag}

select count(*) from b_sample t where 1=1 and t.sampid=#{sampid} and t.sampid!=#{NoId} and t.sampcode=#{sampcode} and t.groupid=#{groupid} and t.companyid=#{companyid} and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid} and t.storageid=#{storageid} and t.grainid=#{grainid} and t.grainattrid=#{grainattrid} and t.producingyear=#{producingyear} and t.sampdate=#{sampdate} and t.sampname=#{sampname} and t.sampqty=#{sampqty} and t.standardqty=#{standardqty} and t.sampfrom=#{sampfrom} and t.iccardnum=#{iccardnum} and t.validdate=#{validdate} and t.baoguanuse=#{baoguanuse} and t.baoguanpos=#{baoguanpos} and t.clearflag=#{clearflag} and t.cleardate=#{cleardate} and t.clearuser=#{clearuser} and t.createuserid=#{createuserid} and t.createtime=#{createtime} and t.delflag=#{delflag}
